description:
This course is for the benefit of everyone. If financial constraints prevent you from enrolling, send me a message and I will give you access to all of my courses for free.

This training provides you everything you need to know about Microsoft PowerPoint. From the fundamentals, to the most advanced features, after taking this online class you will be able to use Microsoft PowerPoint at an expert level.

You can learn Microsoft PowerPoint easily and quickly if it is taught correctly. Developed by a Microsoft Certified Master Instructor, this course covers the most recent version of Microsoft PowerPoint for the Mac - Microsoft PowerPoint 2011. As tenured college faculty in computer information technology, and with over fifteen years of experience teaching individuals of all ability levels "how to use" Microsoft PowerPoint, Todd McLeod has designed, refined, and perfected a method for understanding PowerPoint which will allow you to learn what you need to know about Microsoft PowerPoint as quickly and efficiently as possible.

By watching high-quality videos, you will learn all of the following about Microsoft PowerPoint:

  • Learn how to create presentations
  • Learn how to format presentations
  • Learn the secrets of giving a great presenation
  • Learn the difference between content and form
  • Learn how to create transitions between slides
  • Learn how to make your presentation automatically run forever in a loop
  • Learn how to print your slides for your audience
  • Learn how to add notes to your slides
  • Learn how to use templates to quickly create stunning presentations
  • As a bonus, you can download all of the project files used in the videos so that you can get a “hands-on” approach to learning the material

This class is guaranteed to teach you Microsoft PowerPoint. Once enrolled, you will have access to this PowerPoint course for the rest of your life. You will always be able to come back to this PowerPoint class to review material or to learn new material about how to use PowerPoint. Described as “fun” and “amazing” and “life changing,” Todd McLeod’s PowerPoint training will forever transform the way you work with Microsoft PowerPoint. Try this course and see for yourself how quickly and easily you can learn Microsoft PowerPoint.
title: PowerPoint for Mac - From Beginner to Expert in 4 Hours
